alert.note: Alert for Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 23 at 7:50PM MDT until July 23 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN PROWERS COUNTY... At 750 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported flooding in the Lamar area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. On and off heavy rain showers will be possible through 9 PM, especially from Lamar and points south of town HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lamar and Wiley. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
